title: Hide yo teammates! - Master Yi Pentakill

embed.description: MASTA YI PENTAKILL Welcome to The League of Shorty! Suggest what champion and what role I should play next!

body: Welcome to The League of Shorty!Now there isnt much time before yi gets here...oh no...RUUUUUUUUUUN!

replies.body: i see 0 skill with yi displayed in this clip. no alpha strike to dodge, w AA reset, etc. Only yi chasing down low health enemies. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vrvSMLbi4o4

i suck at this game an have never had a penta but getting one with Yi doesn't seem braggable. Go get one with Naut or Rammus...yi is boring to watch this with.
Grats though either way
